all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
He that is slothful shall not be counted worthy to stand, and he that learns not his duty and shows himself not approved shall not be counted worthy to stand. Even so. Amen.
Doctrine and Covenants 107:100
Quote of the Day
"Every week many are responding to the Saviour’s invitation by returning to discipleship and Church activity, quietly and humbly seeking the healing that Jesus promises."
Elder S. Mark Palmer | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
